outputChartAsImageToStream

public void outputChartAsImageToStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                                       boolean force)
Renders the LineChart as an image to the given output stream

Specified by:
outputChartAsImageToStream in interface Chart
Parameters:
out - The output stream to write the chart to
force - If the charts type is not image, forces the chart to be rendered as image
